Class Ini._Line

java.lang.Object
  Ini._Line
Enclosing class:
Ini
private static class Ini._Line
extends Object

A line from an ini-type stream.

Field Summary
 String comment
          The comment at the end of a key/value or section, or a line that does not have either.

 String line

 String value
          The value of the key.

Field Detail

line

public String line
The actual contents of the line, without any line endings

keyOrSection

public String keyOrSection
The key or section. It's a section if there is no value.

value

public String value
The value of the key.

comment

public String comment
The comment at the end of a key/value or section, or a line that does not have either.

Constructor Detail

Ini._Line

public Ini._Line(Ini._Line other)
Creates a copy of a _Line

Parameters:
other - The _line to copy

Ini._Line

public Ini._Line(String lineIn,
                 String keyIn,
                 String valueIn,
                 String commentIn)
New _Line with the line, raw key, raw value and raw comment from the ini stream.

Parameters:
lineIn - The actual line from the ini-type stream, without line ending
keyIn - The actual key from the ini-type stream, still escaped
valueIn - The actual value from the ini-type stream, still escaped
commentIn - The actual comment from the ini-type stream, still escaped

Ini._Line

public Ini._Line(String lineIn,
                 String sectionIn,
                 String commentIn)
New _Line with the line, raw section and raw comment from the ini stream.

Parameters:
lineIn - The actual line from the ini-type stream, without line ending
sectionIn - The actual section from the ini-type stream, still escaped
commentIn - The actual comment from the ini-type stream, still escaped

Ini._Line

public Ini._Line(String commentIn)
New _Line with the line, raw key, raw value and raw comment from the ini stream.

Parameters:
commentIn - The actual comment from the ini-type stream, still escaped

Ini._Line

public Ini._Line(boolean directSignatureIgnoreThisParameter,
                 String sectionIn,
                 String commentIn)
Create a _Line from client use, not an ini-type stream.

Parameters:
directSignatureIgnoreThisParameter - Pass true. Used for signature differentiation.
sectionIn - The section to create.
commentIn - The comment for the section.

Ini._Line

public Ini._Line(boolean directSignatureIgnoreThisParameter,
                 String keyIn,
                 String valueIn,
                 String commentIn)
Create a _Line from client use, not an ini-type stream.

Parameters:
directSignatureIgnoreThisParameter - Pass true. Used for signature differentiation.
keyIn - The key to create.
valueIn - The value for the key
commentIn - The comment for the key.
Method Detail

isSection

public boolean isSection()
Tells how to treat keyOrSection.

Returns:
true if keyOrSection is a section name, false if it is a key name

rebuild

public void rebuild()
Rebuilds the line field from the other paramters. Usually after modifying fields, rebuild() is called.
